Important

Information for partners

How does your referral program work?

The OVAX GLOBAL referral program provides an opportunity to earn a referral commission from the deposits of your invited partners. When you invite new partners and they open a deposit, you get a certain percentage of the amount of their deposit as a referral commission. The referral program works on a linear basis and your commission depends on the activity of your invited partners.

How to invite a partner?

Copy your referral link or use the provided referral tools such as banners or promotional materials.
Share your referral link with potential partners, for example by sending it via email, social networks or other communication channels.
When your partners register on the OVAX GLOBAL platform through your referral link and make a deposit, you will receive a referral commission.
Make sure you read the terms and conditions of the referral program to be aware of the rewards and requirements.

Do I need to have my own deposit to invite partners?

No, you do not need to have your own deposit to invite partners. You can get a referral link and attract new partners without even investing your own funds.
However, it is worth noting that having a personal deposit can affect your position in the career ladder and the possibility of receiving a larger referral commission. In accordance with the terms of the leadership program, owning your own deposit can help increase the size of the referral commission.

How often will I receive referral commission?

You will receive a referral commission every time your partners open a deposit. There are no limits on the frequency or number of referral rewards. As soon as your invited partner makes a deposit, the referral commission will be credited to your account, and you can use it or withdraw it at any time convenient for you.
